title: IP Addressing, Subnetting, and CIDR Notation
goal: Learn the fundamentals of IP Addressing, Subnetting, and CIDR Notation and practice with a small exercise.
actions: Read/skim: Research: IP Addressing, Subnetting, and CIDR Notation
Find one real-world example of IP Addressing, Subnetting, and CIDR Notation. Write down: what it is, one benefit, one challenge
Self-test: Without looking at notes, explain IP Addressing, Subnetting, and CIDR Notation to an imaginary coworker in 2-3 sentences
completion_check: Can explain IP Addressing, Subnetting, and CIDR Notation in your own words and completed the practice exercise
subdomain: IP Addressing, Subnetting, and CIDR Notation
subdomains_covered: IP Addressing, Subnetting, and CIDR Notation
